smsfabn.description: smsf abn only applicable for existing individual and corporate smsf account

registrationstate.description: registration state only applicable for for existing individual and corporate smsf  account

wealthsource.description: wealthsource is required for individual and corporate smsf

agree.description: it is for agreeing terms and conditions. only applicable for for existing individual and corporate smsf  account

docissuer.description: by default value  www.superfundlookup.gov.au passed from ui if terms and condition are agreed

documentnumber.description: by default value  notapplicable passed from ui if terms and condition are agreed

verificationsource.description: by default value  Website search passed from ui if terms and condition are agreed

englishtranslation.description: by default value  notapplicable passed from ui if terms and condition are agreed

taxoption.description: taxoption is required for smsf account

tfn.description: tfn  number is required  if tax option is selected as Tax File Number provided.

exemptionreason.description: exemptionreason is required  if tax option is selected as Exemption Reason provided.

regdate.description: regdate of already established SMSF. only applicable for for existing individual and corporate smsf  account

registeredforgst.description: registeredforgst is required. For new individual and corporate smsf by default value is NO

additionalsourceofwealth.description: additionalsourceofwealth is required whenwealthsource is  Additional Sources
